about.details:
Incorporated in February 2013, GEM Enviro Management Limited is a waste management company specialising in recycling all packaging waste, including plastic waste. The company's services can be divided into the following categories:

1. EPR consultancy and fulfilment for Plastic Waste

2. Collection and recycling of Industrial Plastic Waste

3. Sales and Marketing of recycled products

4. ESG Consulting and BRSR (Business Responsibility and Sustainability Reporting)

Through awareness programs, the company educates people about proper plastic waste disposal and recycling. It generates revenue from selling recycled products and markets these products to existing business customers, emphasizing their environmental benefits and cost-effectiveness.

In the fiscal year 2023-24, GEM began offering ESG consulting and BRSR services to clients. This encompasses comprehensive ESG consulting tailored to each client's needs, including assessing current ESG practices, identifying areas for improvement, and integrating sustainability into core business operations through thorough ESG audits, stakeholder engagement, materiality assessments, and benchmarking.

GEM Enviro Management has a diverse portfolio with over 100 clients across various industries, including F&B, FMCG, Cement, Fertilizers, Packaging, and Consumer Goods. Some prominent clients are Bengal Beverages Private Limited and Varun Beverages Limited.

As of June 2024, the company has 51 full-time employees.

faqs.question: What is the GEM Enviro IPO?
faqs.answer:
GEM Enviro IPO is a SME IPO of 5990400 equity shares of the face value of ₹5 aggregating up to ₹44.93 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹75 per share. The minimum order quantity is 1600.

The IPO opens on June 19, 2024, and closes on June 21, 2024.

Skyline Financial Services Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in GEM Enviro IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in GEM Enviro IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in GEM Enviro IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in GEM Enviro IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'GEM Enviro IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When GEM Enviro IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The GEM Enviro IPO opens on June 19, 2024 and closes on June 21, 2024.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of GEM Enviro IPO?
faqs.answer: GEM Enviro IPO lot size is 1600, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for GEM Enviro IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in GEM Enviro IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is GEM Enviro IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for GEM Enviro IPO will be done on Monday, June 24, 2024, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, June 25, 2024. Check the GEM Enviro IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is GEM Enviro IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The GEM Enviro IPO listing date is on Wednesday, June 26, 2024.
